resources.string: Some android devices remove background apps to save battery if users don\'t explicitly turn OFF battery optimization. So we recommend turning OFF battery optimization for our app in system settings. This will prevent our app from closing or shutting off unexpectedly. 1010To do it, follow these steps. 10101) Click \"Turn off now\" below 102) Select \"All apps\" from top drop-down menu103) Find & click our app104) Select \"Don’t optimize\"
You can select at most %s sounds
Watch a short video to get this premium mix
Regular bedtime helps form healthy sleep habits
Select your profile type based on your preferences.
Personalized Guidance Based on Your Assessment Performance

• Congratulations on maintaining excellent wellbeing! Keep up the good work. 

 • Maintain your healthy habits and continue engaging in activities that bring you joy and fulfillment. 

 • Consider helping others or giving back to your community to enhance your sense of purpose even further. 

 • Remember to take breaks and practice self-care regularly to sustain your high level of wellbeing.

• Your wellbeing appears to be severely impacted, and its crucial to take immediate action.

 • Reach out to a mental health professional or crisis helpline for immediate support and guidance.

 • Remember that its okay to ask for help and that there are resources available to support you through difficult times.

 • Take small steps towards self-care, such as getting enough rest, eating nourishing foods, and avoiding substances that may exacerbate your situation.

 • Surround yourself with supportive individuals who can offer encouragement and assistance as you work towards improving your wellbeing.
For personalized guidance and improved performance, contact our doctors today.

• It seems like you are struggling with several aspects of your wellbeing.

 • Dont hesitate to reach out for support from trusted individuals or seek professional help if needed.

 • Focus on prioritizing self-care activities and addressing any underlying issues contributing to your low mood or stress levels.

 • Consider making lifestyle changes, such as improving sleep habits, increasing physical activity, or seeking therapy, to improve your overall wellbeing.

• Your wellbeing is average, but there is room for improvement in various areas.

 • Identify specific areas of your life that need attention, such as stress management, social connections, or physical health.

 • Take proactive steps to address any concerns or challenges you are facing, whether its seeking support from friends, family, or professionals.

 • Experiment with different strategies to find what works best for you in terms of improving your mood and overall wellbeing.

• You are doing well overall, but there might be some areas you could improve.

 • Focus on managing stress effectively through relaxation techniques, exercise, or mindfulness practices.

 • Make sure to maintain a healthy work-life balance and prioritize activities that contribute positively to your overall happiness.

 • Seek out opportunities for personal growth and development to further enhance your wellbeing.
\"I am greatful for my body and all that it does for me\"
\"I am surrounded by love and positivity.\"
\"I trust the journey of my life.\"
\"Every day is a new opportunity for growth and happiness.\"
\"I am resilient, and I can overcome any challenge.\"
\"I radiate confidence, self-respect, and inner harmony.\"
\"I am grateful for the beauty that each day brings.\"
\"I am deserving of all the good things life has to offer.\"
\"I am at peace with my past, present, and future.\"
\"My mind is filled with positive and loving thoughts.\"
\"I am a beacon of light and positivity.\"
\"I am in control of my thoughts and emotions.\"
\"I am worthy of love and kindness.\"
\"I release all negativity and embrace joy and positivity.\"
\"I am a source of inspiration for others.\"
\"I am enough just as I am.\"
\"Believe in yourself; you\'re the architect of your brighter future.\"

Asato Ma Sad Gamaya,
 Tamaso Ma Jyotir Gamaya,
 Mrityor Ma Amritam Gamaya
